role: Owns enterprise revenue, especially carriers, adjusters, and large partners. Focused on ecosystem & enterprise expansion in phase 4.
goals: Support multi-tenant, enterprise, and ecosystem growth.
Create repeatable systems for this function at scale.
Align with regulatory, partner, and enterprise expectations.
tasks: Define phase-specific priorities and success measures for this role.
Collaborate with adjacent roles and teams to align roadmaps and avoid silos.
Deliver at least one meaningful system, process, or capability upgrade in this phase.
Document decisions, tradeoffs, and learnings to inform future phases.
Build a repeatable enterprise sales motion and pipeline.
Collaborate with Product and Partnerships on pricing and packaging.
deliverables: Phase 4 strategy and priority doc for the VP of Enterprise Sales function.
Updated documentation for systems, processes, and decisions owned by this role.
One or more concrete improvements shipped in this phase.
success_metrics: Clear contribution of this role to company and product goals in this phase.
Improved maturity of this function compared to previous phase.
Stakeholder confidence and reduced confusion in this domain.
